snippet: A program of deviltry and mischief features Miranda Cuckson, violin, and Blair McMillen, piano, at Columbia University’s Italian Academy.
lead_paragraph: A program of deviltry and mischief features Miranda Cuckson, violin, and Blair McMillen, piano, at Columbia University’s Italian Academy.

headline.seo: Miranda Cuckson and Blair McMillen in Recital
headline.main: Music for Violin, With Faustian Strings Attached
